content:
That's a great start! It's essential to prioritize your health and take proactive steps to reduce the risks associated with prolonged sitting and typing. Remember to stay hydrated, take regular breaks, and maintain a healthy work environment.

Speaking of which, I've been experiencing some occasional back pain lately, which I'm pretty sure is related to my job that involves long hours of sitting and typing. I've been considering visiting a chiropractor or physical therapist to get some professional advice on how to manage the pain and prevent it from getting worse.
